title: technofest`2k10
description:
The official website for technofest`2k10 a national level technical fest organised at VR Siddhartha Engineering College. As worked on the landing page of the website and the Department of CSE website.

As key member in the organising committee, I developed the website for the festival. This was my first ever website that was made public.

In 2010 its a trend that people give two versions of a same website in form of HTML and Flash. I worked on the html website by taking a base free template. The Flash website was from the free theme `supernove` a Flash and XML customisable template.

nextProject.description:
Site developed for Crux Metals and Minerals, it took 3 or 4 days to complete the design i think. It was developed in asp.net visual studio, with base HTML5 Boilerplate default template.

Using the Visual Studio 2010 Express, we can develop the site with a rapid speed. Concept of the Master Pages done all the work. So we just need to fill the content in the pages. Any correction in the common content like menu bar or logo we need not change the data in each and every page, just a simple change in the master page will affect all the change in all the pages.

Nivo Slider - Nivo Slider is a Jquery image slider with give a flash like effects in the transitions. It’s my favourite slider, Used it with some images in all the pages.

Enquiry - In the enquiry page we have a small enquiry form which directly send a mail to the customer email address. The Visual Studio inbuilt form validation make my work easy, without going for any 3rd party Jquery or Javascript Validation Engines. Just a drag and drop, done!!!

HTML5 Boilerplate -In lot of my project i will use this base template, it is difficult to start everything from the scratch, HTML5 Boilerplate will provide all the css, js and png fixes which are very common in all the projects.
nextProject.title: cruxmm.com

previousProject.description:
Infinito is an Intradepartmental TechnoCultural Fest conducted in out college, it was initiated by our seniors they called it as skill launch they conducted only technical and management events. We added cultural events. I am the main coordinator of that, along with my friend subhash we both planed it first and with the help of our friends we organised the event successfully.

This web site was done for that event, its just a JqueryUI theme black and brown and just a jquery popup and carousel.

This site was developed just in one day. As we have very less time to do all the things.
previousProject.title: infinito
